Package org.cougaar.core.wp

This package contains the Cougaar "white pages" naming service.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ListAllAgents A non-scalable utility class to recursively find all agents in the white pages.
ListAllNodes A non-scalable utility class to recursively find all nodes in the white pages.
LoopbackWhitePages This component is a node-local (loopback) implementation of the WhitePagesService.
MessageTimeoutUtils A utility class to attach an MTS timeout attribute to a message address.
Parameters TODO modify wp code to use Arguments directly, since this is now a dumb wrapper.
Timestamp A utility class to format longs as: TIMESTAMP{[+-]RELATIVE_TO_NOW} .
WhitePagesMessage A message between white pages caches and servers, or between servers.
WhitePagesServlet This component loads the optional "/wp" servlet for viewing and altering the white pages.
 

Package org.cougaar.core.wp Description

This package contains the Cougaar "white pages" naming service.

The implementation is divided into:

  • org.cougaar.core.wp.resolver:
    The client-side naming cache, lease manager, and server-selection,

  • org.cougaar.core.wp.server:
    The servers, which can be replicated,

  • org.cougaar.core.wp.bootstrap:
    Shared bootstrap components for clients to discover servers (e.g. cache the server address from either ConfigReader config file or website) and for servers to advertise their addresses (e.g. through an HTTP Servlet).

For more detail, see the Cougaar Developers' Guide.
